titleInfo.title: Etta James Live in Concert at the House of Blues

mods.abstract: Two color window card (split fountain light blue to dark blue on split fountain light orange to dark orange and white) announcing Etta James live in concert at the House of Blues on September 8. Poster features woodcuts of stars.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
